channel.title: Need To Know How To Make A Client For My Server
channel.description: hi, i want to know how to make a client for my server, i also want to know how to make it a java file when running it, not a windows batch file. Please help.

item.title: Need To Know How To Make A Client For My Server
item.dc:creator: @harmony524 harmony524
item.description:
@harmony524 wrote:

k ffs here is one hope it helps u

Diffuculty:0.5/10
assumed knowledge:any soz
requirments:a client and java classes

to begin just follow the steps and ull have ur own client

step 1:download any client i suggest cerda’s its better if ur server supports silab models use galkons anarchy some how download or silab client if not then cerda’s or any other one.

step 2:wanna change the background look of ur client thats easy any noob can do it just go to ur clients theme then right click edit it will open paint just edit the background look of it as u want it to be …

step 3:to make it connect to ur server i choose galkons just post the server ip that connects to it or change it some how look in other client tutorials

step 4:wanna make it a .jar hope it works just right click open with default program and set it to open with .jar file

step 5:set ur client files and ur client in an archive to .rar then upload it somewhere in uppit,mega,rapid ur choice of uploader

step 6:enjoy!make sure to post link on ur forums

                                                                         [u]                [/u]

hope that helped!!!

Read full topic
item.source: Need To Know How To Make A Client For My Server
